OrgName.entry: SHELTER HOMELESS FAMILIES HOUSING SUPPORT SERVICE - SHEFFIELD

Desc.entry: A registered charity which provides support to homeless families and pregnant women in temporary accommodation to move into and settle in permanent accommodation and avoid the risk of recurring homelessness. Referrals from Sheffield City Council's Homeless Services, Interim Accommodation staff, HASS (Homeless Assessment and Support Service) and Homefinders.

category.entry: HOUSING, ADVICE AND SUPPORT FOR HOMELESS OR VULNERABLE PEOPLE
